title: Sprout Backpack
description: Designed for kid's age two to four, this 9-liter daypack features a convenient handle at pack's face so parents can put the brakes on overzealous little explorers.

title: Boys Glove
description: An all-around fleece glove for cold conditions, this cozy glove keeps boys' hands warm beneath its soft fleece. This fleece glove is ideal for cold weather treks or playing outside in frosty conditions.

title: Girls Glove
description: An all-around fleece glove for cold conditions, this cozy glove keeps girls' hands warm beneath its soft fleece. This fleece glove is ideal for cold weather treks or playing outside in frosty conditions.

title: Boys Beanie
description: Classic fleece beanie designed to keep boys toasty in cold weather.

title: Girls Beanie
description: This comfortable hat is cut from plush high loft fleece, keeping adventurous girls toasty in wintry conditions.

title: Boys Hoodie Jacket
description: A classic, durable, hooded fleece jacket is made from heavyweight series fleece that features abrasion-resistant panels on the torso, shoulders, torso, elbows and hood.

title: Boys TriClimate Jacket
description: Ready for the park or powder, this new three-in-one snowsports jacket has you covered. Designed with a waterproof, breathable, fully seam sealed outer shell and an interior (removable) insulated nylon ripstop jacket, this duo creates a snow-shedding, warm combination ideal for wintertime shredding.

title: Girls Resolve Jacket
description: Because girls venture outdoors despite wet weather, this coveted rain jacket keeps them dry on treks when it's raining cats and dogs. A stellar piece of rainwear, this waterproof, breathable, mesh-lined jacket features an attached hood for extra protection in harsh conditions. Mesh liner aids with breathability to prevent overheating.

title: Girls Hoodie Jacket
description: Like warm, freshly baked brownies on a cold day, the Oso Hoodie is a ridiculously comforting fleece that girls will never want to take off. Designed for cold weather use either as a standalone jacket, or as a layering piece, this full zip hoodie features an attached hood for extra protection against cold conditions.

title: Boys Insulated Pants
description: Durable waterproof, breathable, fully seam sealed, insulated snowpant withstands loads of use, and accommodates growth year after year. Partial elastic waist with belt loops and snap front closure permits a secure fit. Grow cuffs at leg opening extend the length _ and life _ of pant by extending an extra 2íñ if needed to keep up with growth spurts.

title: Boys Cargo Shorts
description: With a classic cut, these water-resistant shorts complete any outfit geared toward wet sports. Made to last with durable fabric, they have an adjustable elastic waistband for easy on and off.

title: Girls Insulated Pants
description: Whether they're building blue ribbon kickers, or learning how to master the chair lift, these new durable, waterproof snow pants keep girls dry and warm throughout the winter season. Made with waterproof, breathable, fully seam sealed fabric, this durable material repels snow to keep girls dry and is coupled with a lightweight-yet-warm insulation throughout for wintertime warmth. Partial elastic waist with belt loops and snap front closure permits a secure fit. Grow cuffs at leg opening extend the length and life of pant by extending an extra 2 inches if needed to keep up with growth spurts.

title: Girls Active Shorts
description: Prime workout short for active youth, featuring an internal drawstring for a secure fit. Mesh liner and side panels increase breathability. 3.5 inch inseam.

title: Boys Pullover
description: A super durable pullover hoodie ideal to bring along on camping trips, or sport on cool weather hikes. Made from a soft 100 fleece, this durable fabric is both easy to care for and dries quickly. A large kangaroo-style pocket at front provides plenty of room to stash hands and other petite items.

title: Boys Short Sleeve Tee
description: 100% cotton t-shirt fit for all activities.

title: Girls Acceleration Tee
description: Technical short-sleeve performance tee designed for active youth with flat lock stitching to eliminate any potential chafing or abrasion.

title: Girls Zip Hoodie
description: Ultra-comfortable fleece full zip hoodie for girls to layer on overnighters at camp, or on a long day-hike. Made with extremely durable, pill-resistant, lightweight fleece, this sweatshirt-styled full zip hoodie features ribbing at cuffs and waist for a comfortable fit.

title: Boys Lace Boot
description: Lace-up the Chilkats for winter treks, snowshoe excursions, or an all-purpose buffer to sport in wet, snowy conditions. A highly versatile all-purpose winter boot, the Chilkats keeps feet warm in temperatures down to -25F, and provides exceptional grip on frozen surfaces.

title: Girls Running Shoe
description: Highly durable, stable, and adaptable to all surfaces; the Betasso transports girls from the playground with friends, to the trail with mom. Lightweight, this all-purpose running shoe is designed with a plastic aglet for easy on/off access.
